issue.description: Haplotypic overlap between CU694451.13 and BX649468.12, this covers 3 genes
issue.resolution_text: CU694451.13 has been resubmitted shortening the submission and removing the high variation overlap with BX649468.12.

issue.description: Haplotypic overlap between clones BX088697 and BX470126 involving novel gene similar to vertebrate IQSEC3.
issue.resolution_text: Components CT573128.9 and CU137645.14 have replaced components BX640577.17-BX571815.16-BX470126.27 in the reference assembly removing the haplotypic overlap between BX470126.27 and BX088697.9

issue.description: Suggest clone FP017251.5 can be removed and clone BX323869.7 cut back
issue.resolution_text: Component BX323869 has been resubmitted resulting in an accession.version update to BX323869.8. This update has reduced the length of overlapping sequence with component FP017251.5 eliminating a poor overlap alignment.

issue.summary: neighbouring clones CU861462 and CT573126 are in the wrong orientation wrt one another
issue.description: split gene on different strands as clones CU861462 and CT573126 are in the wrong orientation with each other
issue.resolution_text: The orientation of CU861462.7 has now been fixed and the region contiguated through components FO681318.2 and FQ377934.3 spanning the gaps either side of CU861462.7

issue.summary: There's a gap between FP245457.3 and BX649411.10
issue.description: There's a gap between FP245457.3 and BX649411.10

issue.description: Potential overlap between clones on chr 5 and 4
issue.resolution_text: Components CU929134.10, BX470140.10, FP236471.9, FP003601.5, AL935202.7 and FP003593.6 have been placed on the chromosome 4 TPF. They localise to a gap covered by JIRA ticket ZG-3944.

issue.status_text: MGH marker analysis places contig ctg10380 comprosing finished components FP074866.7-CU694368.3 (ZG-6652) in the gap, with CU694368.3 proximal to the telomere. The components have been added to the TPF.

issue.description: A gap in the chromosome exists between components CU695020.16 and CT025936.9
issue.resolution_text: Strand seqencing data indicates that components CT025936.9, BX649324.3 and CT025691.7 are in an incorrect orientation in the reference assembly. Therefore components CU695020.16 and CT025936.9 are no longer paired across a gap.

issue.description: A gap in the chromosome exists between components CT025691.7 and CT573393.17
issue.resolution_text: Strand seqencing data indicates that components CT025936.9, BX649324.3 and CT025691.7 are in an incorrect orientation in the reference assembly. Therefore components CT025691.7 and CT573393.17 are no longer paired across a gap.

issue.description: A gap in the chromosome exists between components FP236856.8 and BX255922.4

issue.summary: Can unplaced contig NW_003051536.2 be chromosomally placed in future genome assemblies.
issue.description: Can unplaced contig NW_003051536.2 be chromosomally placed in future genome assemblies.
issue.resolution_text: Unplaced contig NW_003051536.2 has been localised to chromosome 4 through strand sequencing analysis. End pair information links the contig to congtig ctg326 placing in the gap covered by ticket ZG-6683.

issue.summary: GapMap marker information relocates ctg10273 onto Chr4
issue.description: GapMap marker information relocates ctg10273 onto Chr4.
issue.resolution_text: GAPMAP marker analysis localises contig ctg10273 to chromosome 4, exact placement is unknown at this time. The contig has been added to the TPF.

issue.summary: GapMap marker information relocates ctg10380 onto Chr4
issue.description: GapMap marker information relocates ctg10380 onto Chr4.
issue.resolution_text: MGH markers localise contig ctg10380 to chromsome 4 in the gap tracked in JIRA ticket ZG-3934

issue.summary: Strand sequencing information indicates components in wrong orientation
issue.description: Strand sequencing information indicates that overlapping components CT025936.9, BX649324.3 and CT025691.7 are in the wrong orientation in the reference assembly.
issue.resolution_text: Orientation of components CT025936.9, BX649324.3 and CT025691.7 has been changed in the TPF following analysis of strand sequencing data. This affects the following gap tickets ZG-3946 and ZG-3947.

issue.status_text: 04-FEB-13: CH211-91J12 has entered the sequencing pipeline
issue.description: There is a gap in the chromosome between components CU695020.16 and CT025691.7
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.status_text: Finished component BX842699.5 provides extension from CT025963.9 in to the gap. BX842699.5 overlaps component BX649324.3 making CT025963.9 redundant. CT025963.9 will be removed from the reference assembly. Unplaced contig NW_003051536.2 comprising components CU693376.6, CU693450.3 and CU693439.4 has been localised through strand sequencing to chromsome 4 (ZG-3973)
issue.description: There is a gap in the chromosome between components CT025936.9 and CT573393.17
issue.resolution_text: na
